meta.description: Snow White, is the characteristic colour of the whites; it is the purest white colour; being free of all intermixture, it resembles new-fallen snow.
Reddish White, is composed of [snow white], with a very minute portion of [crimson red] and [ash grey].

meta.animal: Junction of the Neck and Back of the Kittiwake Gull.
meta.description: Purplish White, is [snow white], with the slightest tinge of [crimson red] and [Berlin blue], and a very minute portion of [ash grey].
Yellowish White, is composed of [snow white], with a very little [lemon yellow] and [ash grey].

meta.animal: Breast of White or Screech Owl.
meta.description: Orange-coloured White, is [snow white], with a very small portion of [tile red] and [king's yellow], and a minute portion of [ash grey].

meta.animal: Vent Coverts of Golden crested Wren.
meta.description: Greenish White, is [snow white], mixed with a very little [emerald green] and [ash grey].

meta.vegetable: Back of the Petals of Blue Hepatica.
meta.description: Skimmed-milk White, is [snow white], mixed with a little [Berlin blue] and [ash grey].
Greyish White, is [snow white], mixed with a little [ash grey].

meta.animal: Breast of long tailed Hen Titmouse.
meta.description: Ash Grey, is the characteristic colour of Werner's Greys; he gives no description of its component parts; it is composed of [snow white], with portions of [smoke] and [French grey], and a very little [yellowish grey] and [carmine red].

meta.animal: Breast of the Robin round the Red.
meta.description: Smoke Grey, is [ash grey] mixed with a little [brown].
French Grey, nearly the steel grey of Werner, without the lustre, is [greyish white], with a slight tinge of [black] and [carmine red].

meta.animal: Backs of black headed and Kittiwake Gulls.
meta.vegetable: Back of Petals of Purple Hepatica.
meta.description: Pearl Grey, is [ash grey] mixed with a little [crimson red] and [blue], or [bluish grey] with a little [red].
Yellowish Grey, is [ash grey] mixed with [lemon yellow] and a minute portion of [brown].

meta.animal: Back and tail Coverts Wood Pigeon.
meta.description: Bluish Grey, is [ash grey] mixed with a little [blue].
Greenish Grey, is [ash grey] mixed with a little [emerald green], a small portion of [black], and a little [lemon yellow].
Blackish Grey, a blackish lead grey of Werner without the lustre is [ash grey], with a little [blue] and a portion of [black].

meta.animal: Water Ousel. Breast and upper Part of Back of Water Hen.
meta.description: Greyish Black, is composed of [velvet black], with a portion of [ash grey].
Bluish Black, is [velvet black], mixed with a little [blue] and [blackish grey].
Greenish Black, is [velvet black], mixed with a little [brown], [yellow], and [green].

meta.animal: Guillemot Wing Coverts of Black Cock.
meta.description: Pitch, or Brownish Black, is [velvet black], mixed with a little [brown] and [yellow].

meta.animal: Spots on Large Wings of Tyger Moth. Breast of Pochard Duck.
meta.description: Reddish Black, is [velvet black], mixed with a very little [carmine red], and a small portion of [chestnut brown].
Ink Black, is [velvet black], with a little [indigo blue] in it.

meta.animal: Mole. Tail Feathers of Black Cock.
meta.vegetable: Black of Red and Black West-Indian peas.
meta.description: Velvet Black, is the characteristic colour of the blacks; it is the colour of black velvet.
Scotch Blue, is [Berlin blue], mixed with a considerable portion of [velvet black], a very little [grey], and a slight tinge of [carmine red].

meta.animal: Beauty Spot on Wing of Mallard Drake.
meta.description: Prussian Blue, is [Berlin blue], with a considerable portion of [velvet black], and a small quantity of [indigo blue].
Indigo Blue, is composed of [berlin blue], a little [black], and a small portion of [apple green].
China Blue, is [azure blue], with a little [prussian blue] in it.
Azure Blue, is [Berlin blue], mixed with a little [carmine red]: it is a burning colour.

meta.animal: Upper Side of the Wings of small blue Heath Butterfly.
meta.description: Ultramarine Blue, is a mixture of equal parts of [Berlin] and [azure blue].

meta.animal: Light Parts of the Margin of the Wings of Devil's Butterfly.
meta.description: Flax-Flower Blue, is [Berlin blue], with a slight tinge of [ultramarine blue].
Berlin Blue, is the pure, or characteristic colour of Werner.
Verditter Blue, is [Berlin blue], with a small portion of [verdigris green].
Greenish Blue, the sky blue of Werner, is composed of [Berlin blue], [white], and a little [emerald green].
Greyish Blue, the smalt blue of Werner, is composed of [Berlin blue], with [white], a small quantity of [grey], and a hardly perceptible portion of [red].
Bluish Lilac Purple, is [bluish purple] and [white].

meta.vegetable: Parts of White and Purple Crocus.
meta.description: Bluish Purple, is composed of about equal parts of [Berlin blue] and [carmine red].
Violet Purple, violet blue of Werner, is [Berlin blue] mixed with [red], and a little [brown].
Pansy Purple, is [indigo blue], with [carmine red], and a slight tinge of [raven black].
Campanula Purple, is [ultramarine blue] and [carmine red], about equal parts of each: it is the characteristic colour.

meta.vegetable: Deep Parts of Flower of Saffron Crocus.
meta.description: Imperial Purple, is [azure] and [indigo blue], with [carmine red], about equal parts of each.

meta.animal: Egg of largest Bluebottle. or Flesh Fly.
meta.description: Auricula Purple, is [plum purple], with [indigo blue] and much [carmine red].
Plum Purple, the plum blue of Werner, is composed of [Berlin blue], with much [carmine red], a very little [brown], and an almost imperceptible portion of [black].

meta.animal: Light Spots of the upper Wings of Peacock Butterfly.
meta.description: Red Lilac Purple, is [campanula purple], with a considerable portio of [snow white], and a very little [carmine red].

meta.animal: Light Parts of Spots on the under Wings of Peakcock Butterfly.
meta.description: Lavender Purple, the lavender blue of Werner, is composed of [blue], [red], and a little [brown] and [grey].
Pale Bluish Purple, is [lavender purple] mixed with a little [red] and [black].†
Celindine Green, is composed of [verdigris green] and [ash grey].‡
Mountain Green, is composed of [emerald green], with much [blue] and a little [yellowish grey].

meta.vegetable: Sea Kale. Leaves of Leeks in Winter.
meta.description: Leek Green, is composed of [emerald green], with a little [brown] and [bluish grey].

meta.vegetable: Dark Streaks on Leaves of Cayenne Pepper.
meta.description: Blackish Green, is [grass green] mixed with a considerable portion of [black].

meta.animal: Tail of small Long-tailed Green Parrot.
meta.description: Verdigris Green, is composed of [emerald green], much [Berlin blue], and a little [white].

meta.vegetable: Under Disk of Wild Rose Leaves.
meta.description: Bluish Green, is composed of [Berlin blue], and a little [lemon yellow] and [greyish white].

meta.animal: Under Side of Wings of Green Broom Moth.
meta.description: Apple Green, is [emerald green] mixed with a little [greyish white].

meta.animal: Beauty Spot on Wing of Teal Drake.
meta.description: Emerald Green, is the characteristic colour of Werner; he gives no description of the component parts of any of the characteristic colours; it is composed of about equal parts of [Berlin blue] and [gamboge yellow].

meta.vegetable: General Appearance of Grass Fields. Sweet Sugar Pear
meta.description: Grass Green, is [emerald green] mixed with a little [lemon yellow].

Duck Green, W. a new colour of Werner's, added since the publication of his nomenclature; it is composed of [emerald green], with a little [indigo blue], much [gamboge yellow], and a very little [carmine red].

meta.animal: Under Side of lower Wings of Orange tip Butterfly
meta.vegetable: Upper Disk of Leaves of woody Night Shade.
meta.description: Sap Green, is [emerald green], with much [saffron yellow], and a little [chestnut brown].

meta.vegetable: Ripe Pound Pear. Hypman like Saxifrage.
meta.description: Pistachio Green, is [emerald green] mixed with a little [lemon yellow], and a small quantity of [brown].
Asparagus Green, is [pistachio green], mixed with much [greyish white].
Olive Green, is [grass green] mixed with much [brown].

meta.animal: Animal and Shell of common Water Snail.
meta.description: Oil Green, is [emerald green] mixed with [lemon yellow], [chestnut brown], and [yellowish grey].

meta.vegetable: Ripe Coalmar Pear. Irish Pitcher Apple.
meta.description: Siskin Green, is [emerald green] mixed with much [lemon yellow], and a little [yellowish white].

meta.animal: Yellow Parts of large Dragon Fly.
meta.description: Sulphur Yellow, is [lemon yellow] mixed with [emerald green] and [white].
Primrose Yellow, is [gamboge yellow] mixed with a little [sulphur yellow], and much [snow white].
Wax Yellow, is composed of [lemon yellow], [reddish brown], and a little [ash grey].

Lemon Yellow, the characteristic colour of the yellow series of Werner, the colour of ripe lemons; W. it is found to be a mixture of [gamboge yellow] and a little [ash grey]: being a mixed colour, it cannot be adopted as the characteristic colour; the characteristic colours of the blues, reds, and yellows ought to be pure and free from all intermixture with any other colour; gamboge, as the purest yellow colour, is adopted instead of lemon yellow, as the characteristic colour of the yellows.
Gamboge Yellow, is the characteristic colour.
Kings Yellow, is [gamboge yellow], with a small portion of [saffron yellow].
Saffron Yellow, is [gamboge yellow], with [gallstone yellow], about equal parts of each.
Gallstone Yellow, is [gamboge yellow], with a small quantity of [Dutch orange], and a minute portion of [honey yellow].

meta.animal: Lower Parts of Neck of Bird of Paradise.
meta.description: Honey Yellow, is [sulphur yellow] mixed with [chestnut brown].
Straw Yellow, is [sulphur yellow] mixed with much [greyish white] and a little [ochre yellow].
Wine Yellow, is [sulphur yellow] mixed with [reddish brown] and [grey], with much [snow white].

meta.animal: Vent Parts of Tail of Bird of Paradise.
meta.description: Sienna Yellow, is [primrose yellow], with a little [ochre yellow].
Ochre Yellow, is [sienna yellow], with a litlte light [chestnut brown].
Cream Yellow, is [ochre yellow] mixed with a little [white] and a very small quantity of [Dutch orange].
Dutch Orange, the orange yellow of Werner, is [gamboge yellow], with [carmine red].

meta.animal: Streak from the Eye of the King Fisher.
meta.vegetable: Stamina of the large White Cistus.
meta.description: Buff Orange, is [sienna yellow], with a little [Dutch Orange].

meta.animal: The Neck Ruff of the Golden Pheasant. Belly of the Warty Newt.
meta.description: Orpiment Orange, the characteristic colour, is about equal parts of [gamboge yellow] and [arterial blood red].

meta.animal: Eyes of the largest Flesh Fly.
meta.description: Brownish Orange, is [orpiment orange], with a little [hyacinth red], and a small quantity of light [chestnut brown].
Reddish Orange, is [buff orange] mixed with a considerable portion of [tile red].
Deep Reddish Orange, is [Dutch orange] mixed with much [scarlet red].
Tile Red, is [hyacinth red] mixed with much [greyish white], and a small portion of [scarlet red].

meta.animal: Red Spots of the Lygœns Apterus Fly.
meta.vegetable: Red on the golden Rennette Apple.
meta.description: Hyacinth Red, is [scarlet red], with [lemon yellow] and a minute proportion of [brown].

meta.animal: Scarlet Ibis or Curlew. Mark on the Head of Red Grouse.
meta.vegetable: Large red Oriental Poppy. Red Parts of red and black Indian Peas.
meta.description: Scarlet Red, is [arterial blood red], with a little [gamboge yellow].
Vermilion Red, is [scarlet red], with a minute portion of [brownish red].
Aurora Red, is [tile red], with a little [arterial blood red], and a slight tinge of [carmine red].
Aterial Blood Red, is the characteristic colour of the red series.
Flesh Red, is [rose red] mixed with [tile red] and a little [white].
Rose Red, is [carmine red], with a great quantity of [snow white], and a very small portion of [cochineal red].
Peach Blossom Red, is [lake red] mixed with much [white].
Carmine Red, the characteristic colour of Werner is [lake red], with a little [arterial blood red].
Lake Red, the crimson red of Werner, is [arterial blood red], with a portion of [Berlin blue].
Crimson Red, is [carmine red], with a little [indigo blue].
Purplish Red, the columbine red of Werner, is [carmine red], with a little [Berlin blue], and a small portion of [indigo blue].

meta.vegetable: Under Disk of decayed Leaves of None-so-pretty.
meta.description: Cochineal Red, is [lake red] mixed with [bluish grey].

meta.vegetable: Musk Flower, or dark Purple Scabious.
meta.description: Veinous Blood Red, is [carmine red] mixed with [brownish black].
Brownish Purple Red, the cherry red of Werner, is [lake red] mixed with [brownish black] and a small portion of [grey].
Chocoloate Red is [veinous blood red] mixed with a little [brownish red].

meta.animal: Mark on Throat of Red-throated Diver.
meta.description: Brownish Red, is [chocolate red] mixed with [hyacinth red] and a little [chestnut brown].

meta.animal: Head of Pochard. Wing coverts of Sheldrake.
meta.description: Deep Orange-coloured Brown, is [chestnut brown], with a little [reddish brown], and a small quantity of [orange brown].

meta.animal: Breast of Pochard, and Neck of Teal Drake.
meta.vegetable: Dead Leaves of green Panic Grass.
meta.description: Deep Reddish Brown, is [chestnut brown] with a little [chocolate red].
Umber Brown, is [chestnut brown], with a little [blackish brown].

meta.animal: Neck and Breast of Red Grouse.
meta.description: Chestnut Brown, the characteristic colour of the browns of Werner's series, W. is [deep reddish brown] and [yellowish brown].

meta.animal: Light Brown Spots on Guinea-Pig. Breast of a Hoopoe.
meta.description: Yellowish Brown, is [chestnut brown] mixed with a considerable portion of [lemon yellow].

meta.animal: Common Weasel. Light parts of Feathers on the Back of the Snipe.
meta.description: Wood Brown, is [yellowish brown] mixed with [ash grey].

meta.animal: Middle Parts of Feathers of Hen Pheasant, and Wing coverts of Gosbeak.
meta.description: Liver Brown, is [chestnut brown] mixed with a little [black] and [olive green].
Hair Brown, is [clove brown] mixed with [ash grey].
Broccoli Brown, is [clove brown] mixed with [ash grey], and a small tinge of [red].

meta.animal: Head and Neck of Male Kestril.
meta.description: Olive Brown, is [ash grey] mixed with a little [blue], [red], and [chestnut brown].§

meta.animal: Stormy Petril. Wing Coverts of black Cock. Forehead of Foumart.
meta.description: Blackish Brown, is composed of [chestnut brown] and [black].
